content: this crop top is designed uniquely designed to have the heart stand out it s such a lovely top that can be used for many different occasions like beach etc it s beginner friendly as it makes use of simple crochet stitches like chain stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet it fits bust 32-38 inches it can be made a gift for teenagers and young adults materials dk weight yarn -1 balls of 100g 4 0 mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors this pattern has been thoroughly tested **buy more save more no codes needed get 10% discount when you purchase 2 patterns at once get 15% discount when you purchase 3 patterns at once get 20% discount when you purchase 4 patterns at once get 25% discount when you purchase 5 patterns at once get 40% discount when you purchase 10 or more patterns at once** this is a pdf pattern and not a finished product it is a copyright issue of toyslab creations you are free to sell whatever you make from this pattern but you can t sell share or modify part or all of the pattern if you have any questions about the pattern contact me via email happy crocheting
